name: sekurlsa::logonpasswords
description: Enumerate interactive logon secrets from an LSASS memory capture.
doc: Builds a read-only command string that inspects a sanitized LSASS dump. Provide a process name or exported dump path to keep the exercise offline.

name: lsadump::sam
description: Simulate pulling the SAM database with LSA protection disabled.
doc: Use this to explain how SAM secrets are materialized. Point the target to a mounted lab image or note that elevated rights are required in production.

name: token::list
description: List delegated and impersonation tokens for the current session.
doc: Demonstrates token enumeration without touching live handles. Adjust options to filter on logon sessions or integrity levels.
